Data: {"recipient_id": "edf061b8-d617-4223-be9b-ed5a0f645b52", "custom": {"attachment": {"type": "template", "payload": {"template_type": "simple_form", "title": "Information for Ad Support Ticket", "description": "This form is used to collect user information in case the user needs additional help and a Jira Ticket needs to be filed with our Support Team.", "descriptionPosition": "top", "hidden_reply": true, "reply_text": "The user completes the submission of the form", "submit_button_title": "Send", "intent_name": "submit_form", "cancel_button": {"title": "Cancel", "type": "postback", "payload": "/cancel_for_input_data", "url": null, "is_enabled": false, "hidden_reply": true}, "is_mailerlite_form": false, "fields": [{"title": "Name", "type": "text", "icon_url": "https://seachat.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/images/icon-name.svg", "is_required": true, "entity_name": "_NAME"}, {"title": "Email", "type": "text", "icon_url": "https://seachat.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/images/icon-email.svg", "is_required": true, "entity_name": "_EMAIL"}, {"title": "Account ID", "type": "text", "icon_url": "", "is_required": true, "entity_name": "VAR_0001"}], "form_id": "ee27568f0b9f4826a7215c8197548501"}}}}

Message: Hi, I’m the NewsBreak Ad Assistant. How can I help?
The user completes the submission of the form
Please enable postback integration for Account ID:1946199133175586818

To assist you with enabling postback integration, could you please let me know which platform you're using? For example, are you using BeMob, CPV-One, or another platform? This will help me provide the most accurate guidance.
I'm here to help with whatever you need! Let me know your question, and I'll do my best to assist you right away.
I would like to activate my ad credit

To activate ad credit, your account must meet certain conditions. First, ensure your account has completed and passed business verification. Additionally, your account or campaign should have accumulated over $5,000 in spend. Once these requirements are met, you can establish a relationship with an Account Manager who can request the ad credit functionality to be enabled for you. If you need further assistance, feel free to reach out!
Yes I have met those conditions - can you put me in touch with my Account manager Brinkley Temple

Thanks for confirming that you've met the conditions. To proceed, please upload a media plan, billing statement, or screenshot showing a daily ad spend of $1,000 or more. Once verified, we’ll be happy to assist with your onboarding and connect you with your dedicated account manager, Brinkley Temple. If you have any questions in the meantime, feel free to reach out!
